rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: An explanation or exegesis of a creative work. Note that a commentary differs from a review in that a review is an appraisal, while a commentary aims to reveal something about the motivation, development, realization, etc. of the creative work.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Commentary

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates a commentary to the specific text in the creative work that the commentary is concerned with.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Target

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates a commentary to the text that makes up the commentary itself.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Text

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A primary entity type that holds properties for any entity that can be appraised or judged. This type should be included in any type containing entities that can be rated and/or reviewed, e.g. tv.program, book.written_work, and automotive.model_year.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Rated Entity

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: An aggregate rating for the given entity. The process for computing the aggregate rating is application-dependent, but it is often the average rating.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Aggregate Rating
rdf:Description.mso:type.property.deprecation_info: The virtual property definition does not take into account all the reviews. DeprecatedBy:[FAREAST\sasinh] Successor:[mso:ratings.rated_entity.weighted_aggregate_rating]

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates a rated entity to a commentary about the rated entity.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Commentary

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:ratings.rated_entity to the grade level recommended or required for viewing/using the rated entity. Currently, the expected_type is text to allow values such as 'pre-school' and 'college-level'.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Grade Level

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates a rated entity to the highest rating(s) given to the entity, where the highest rating is calculated by dividing the rating value by the rating scale.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Highest Rating

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates a rated entity to the lowest rating(s) given to the entity, where the lowest rating is calculated by dividing the rating value by the rating scale.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Lowest Rating

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the maximum age suggested or required by this rating for those viewing/using the rated entity.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Maximum Age

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates a rated entity to the highest rating that has been assigned to the entity.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Maximum Rating

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the minimum age suggested or required for those viewing/using the rated entity.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Minimum Age

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates a rated entity to the lowest rating that has been assigned to the entity.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Minimum Rating

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates a rated entity to the total number of negative ratings assigned to the given entity.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Number of Negative Ratings

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates a rated entity to the value of mso:ratings.rated_entity.number_of_negative_ratings minus the value of mso:ratings.rated_entity.number_of_positive_ratings.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Number of Net Negative Ratings

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates a rated entity to the value of mso:ratings.rated_entity.number_of_positive_ratings minus the value of mso:ratings.rated_entity.number_of_negative_ratings.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Number of Net Positive Ratings

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates a rated entity to the total number of positive ratings assigned to the given entity.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Number of Positive Ratings

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates a rated entity to the total number of ratings assigned to the given entity.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Total Number of Ratings

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates a rated entity to the number of negative ratings of the entity divided by the total number of ratings of the entity.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Percentage of Negative Ratings

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates a rated entity to the number of positive ratings of the entity divided by the total number of ratings of the entity.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Percentage of Positive Ratings

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates an object to the mso:award.ranking relationship that collects data about the item's ranking.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Ranking

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates a given entity to each of the ratings assigned to the entity.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Ratings

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: The high end of the rating scale. The low end is always zero.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Rating Scale
rdf:Description.mso:type.property.deprecation_info: The rating scale is a property of the rating rather than the thing rated. DeprecatedBy:[REDMOND\ianiles] Successor:[mso:ratings.rating.rating_scale]

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Virtual property relating an mso:ratings.rated_entity to a mso:ratings.rating_sentiment from one of the reviews of the entity.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Sentiment

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that links a rated entity to a report about the entity.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Report

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates a given entity to each of the reviews assigned to the entity.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Reviews

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates a rated entity to a snippet that appears in a large number of reviews for the rated entity.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Review Highlight

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Virtual property relating an mso:ratings.rated_entity to the webpage containing a review for the entity. Note this property is redundant with using type.object.webpage with common.webpage.label and common.webpage_label.review. This is a workaround for a shortcoming with virtual properties in the current version of the system.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Review Webpage

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that links a rated entity to an identity that the entity has on a social networking site. Note that this property exists at the mso:ratings.rated_entity level, because almost anything that can be rated/reviewed can have a social network profile, e.g. a movie, a video game, a person, an organization, etc.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Social Network User

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that links a rated entity to a video relating to the entity.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Video Offer

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates a rated entity to an action of viewing details about the entity, e.g. specs, installation/troubleshooting instructions, etc.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: View Details

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies an aggregate rating of the rated entity by computing a weighted mean of all ratings. Note that the aggregated ratings may belong to different domains, e.g. customer and expert domains.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Weighted Aggregate Rating

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A rating of an entity. Note that a review differs from a rating in the level of detail and structure. A rating is generally an assignment of a single value out of a set of limited possible values, while a review is unstructured and provides justification for the evaluation.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Rating

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: The method that is used to combine entities that are appraised with this rating, e.g. average.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Aggregation type
rdf:Description.mso:type.property.deprecation_info: This is a property of the rated entity rather than a particular rating. If the property is needed, it should be added to ratings.rated_entity. DeprecatedBy:[REDMOND\ianiles]

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the date that the rating was assigned.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Rating Time

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:ratings.rating to the grade level assigned to the rating. Currently, the expected_type is a string to allow values such as 'pre-school' and 'college-level'.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Grade Level
rdf:Description.mso:type.property.deprecation_info: Suggested grade level is an attribute of the rated entity, so mso:ratings.rated_entity.grade_level should be used. DeprecatedBy:[REDMOND\ianiles] Successor:[mso:ratings.rated_entity.grade_level]

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the maximum age suggested or required by this rating for those viewing/using the rated entity.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Maximum Age
rdf:Description.mso:type.property.deprecation_info: This is a property of the rated entity, so mso:ratings.rated_entity.maximum_age should be used. DeprecatedBy:[REDMOND\ianiles] Successor:[mso:ratings.rated_entity.maximum_age]

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the minimum age suggested or required by this rating for those viewing/using the rated entity.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Minimum Age
rdf:Description.mso:type.property.deprecation_info: This is a property of the rated entity, so mso:ratings.rated_entity.minimum_age should be used. DeprecatedBy:[REDMOND\ianiles] Successor:[mso:ratings.rated_entity.minimum_age]

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the number of ratings provided by the given source.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Number of ratings

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the number of reviews associated with the given source.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Number of reviews

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property relating a rating to the number of ratings of the same value provided by the given source.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Number of Same Ratings

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies a rating in a qualitative way. Note that this property should be used only when the rating cannot be expressed as a value on a quantitative scale.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Rating Descriptor

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the range of possible values that can be assigned to the rated entity. For example, in the case of a star system for rating hotels, four or five stars is generally the maximum rating that can be given.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Rating Scale

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the value on the rating scale that was selected by the user as part of the given rating.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Rating Value

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the source of the rating, viz. the organization that collected and/or published the rating.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Source

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies a classification of the rating, e.g. user or expert.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Rating type

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: An evaluation of an entity. Note that a review differs from a rating in the level of detail and structure. A rating is generally an assignment of a single value out of a set of limited possible values, while a review is unstructured and provides justification for the evaluation.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Review

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates a review to a summary of the negative aspects of the thing reviewed (according to the review).
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Cons

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: The date that the review was written or was assigned to the rated entity.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Review Date

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property relating a review to a dated ratio expressing the number of helpful/useful votes for the review to the total number of votes on the review.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Helpfulness

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates a review to the date and time when the review was most recently modified.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Last Updated Date

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A Boolean property indicating that the review is positive, i.e. that the reviewer recommends the use, purchase, etc. of the thing recommended.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Positive Review

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates a review to a summary of the positive aspects of the thing reviewed (according to the review).
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Pros

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: The rating scale for the rating the reviewer gave this entity.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Review Rating Scale
rdf:Description.mso:type.property.deprecation_info: This is a property of a rating, not a review DeprecatedBy:[REDMOND\ianiles] Successor:[mso:ratings.rating.rating_scale]

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: The rating the reviewer gave this entity.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Review Rating Value
rdf:Description.mso:type.property.deprecation_info: This is a property of a rating, not of a review. DeprecatedBy:[REDMOND\ianiles] Successor:[mso:ratings.rating.rating_value]

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:ratings.review to a portion of the review text. For the full review test, please see mso:ratings.review.text.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Review Snippet

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that links a review to the social networking profile of the person who created the review.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Reviewer

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates a review to the name or alias of the reviewer to be used for attribution of the review.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Reviewer Alias

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:ratings.review to the source of the review, e.g. Amazon or Review2. Note that the source of the review is not the same as the reviewer, the agent who created the review, whose name should be stored in mso:ratings.review.reviewer_alias.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Source

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates a review to the full text of the review. For a snippet of the review, use ratings.review.review_snippet.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Review Text

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates a review to a classification of the review, e.g. user or expert.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Review Type

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates a review to the action of reading the review.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: View Review

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Type collecting the data on a given review's sentiment. Data includes the review, the opinion words within the review, and other aspects of the review.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Review Sentiment

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:ratings.review_sentiment to the aspect word's end offset in the sample sentence.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Aspect End Offset

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:ratings.review_sentiment to the aspect word's start offset in the sample sentence.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Aspect Start Offset

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:ratings.review_sentiment to the aspect word in the sample sentence.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Aspect Word

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:ratings.review_sentiment to the number of similar negative aspects in the reviews.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Negative Aspect Count

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:ratings.review_sentiment to the opinion word's end offset in the sample sentence.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Opinion End Offset

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:ratings.review_sentiment to the opinion word's start offset in the sample sentence.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Opinion Start Offset

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:ratings.review_sentiment to the opinion word in the sample sentence.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Opinion Word

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:ratings.review_sentiment to the polarity of this review.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Polarity

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:ratings.review_sentiment to the number of similar positive aspects in the reviews.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Positive Aspect Count

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:ratings.review_sentiment to the mso:ratings.review the sentiment is inferred from.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Review

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:ratings.review_sentiment to a sample sentence within the given review.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Sample Sentence

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: An enumeration type whose values can be used to classify reviews.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Review Type
